field.name: spare_kill_modifier
field.field_description: Specifies the modifier that will be used for a character relationship in deciding whether a character will spare/kill in a duel. Use -ve values to add to the "spare" points and +ve values to add to the "kill" points. Range goes from -100 to +100 in code, where -100 is always spare and vice-versa. Note: These modifiers are summed with the ceo_to_duel_outcome_modifiers so if you want to ensure an outcome based on relationship then larger than 100 values can be used to guarantee.
